In Firefox 4, when "Tabs on top" is checked, it will use the title bar's space to place the tabs like Google Chrome. I don't like that.
So, please provide an option to let the user to decide whether Firefox use the title bar's space when "Tabs on top" is checked. Thank you!
Sorry for my poor English.

Reproducible: Always
